chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Welcome to Alphora Dataphor, the most advanced application development toolset available today. Dataphor eliminates or automates the mundane development tasks, allowing the developer to focus on the art of application development.
The Dataphor User's Guide provides the knowledge necessary to begin building applications using Dataphor. The User's Guide is divided into the following parts:

listitem.para: Describes the motivation behind and background of Dataphor, then proceeds to give a tour of Dataphor technology.
Guides the reader through the creation of several sample applications using the Dataphor product.

chapter.para: The User's Guide also includes a Glossary that defines terminology relating to Dataphor.
